mapper.select: select * from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) order by region,id DESC

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) group by date,region

select sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total,date from PersonD where date=(select date from PersonD where id=(select MAX(id) as id from PersonD)) group by date
select * from PersonD where date>=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}

select region, sum(personalLeave) as personalLeave, sum(sickLeave) as sickLeave, sum(annualLeave) as annualLeave, sum(nursingLeave) nursingLeave, sum(bereavementLeave) as bereavementLeave,sum(total) as total from PersonD where date>=#{date1} and date<=#{date2} group by region
mapper.insert: insert into PersonD( region, personalLeave, sickLeave, annualLeave, nursingLeave, bereavementLeave,date) values(#{region},#{personalLeave},#{sickLeave},#{annualLeave},#{nursingLeave},#{bereavementLeave},#{date})
